::Jhiaxus/Zarak/Hot Rod::
   
  Zarak has the imaging helmet ready. It will flash the most horrible images of the evils commited in the past from all known races. They will come and change quickly. Everyone to be driven in and stored in Hot Rod's memory banks.
   
  Jhiaxus walks into the room with the helmet. he slips it on Hot Rod's head and he begins.
   
  In only second Hot Rod is letting out screams that one could not imagine.
   
  Hot Rod: Turn it off! Primus, please! Turn it off! I can't take it! NOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!1
   
  Just as Hot Rod is reaching his mental limit Jhiaxus cocks back and sends his right hand plowing into the lower torso region of Hot Rod's frame. Since Hot Rod is secure he cannot recoil from the attack or the pain. it come again. Again. Again and again. Finally a good shot is given across the jaw.
   
  This continues on and on....

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
          Hydras/Nightlight:

"do it when you're ready"hissed hydras while Nightlight's eyes opened 
wide with horror and strugled tried to freed from her tied.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
>
> ::Jhiaxus::
> 
> Jhiaxus sits Nightlight down in a chair and secures her to it.
> 
> Jhiaxus: We're still going through with this? Alright then. Do we 
have the imaging equipment to mentally break him while I physically 
break him?
